SEARCH
Package server.Model

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
server.Model.GameBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameBoard extends Object implements Serializable
This Class resembles the actual structure of the game with all its components. It provides the methods to create and manipulate the meaningful parts of the Model such as LivingRoom and ItemBag. Have a look at MyShelfie RuleBook for further information
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GameBoard

      public GameBoard(GameModel gameModel)
      This method provide an instance of GameBoard. It also does the binding between the GameBoard and a specific instance of GameModel
      Parameters:
      gameModel - the instance of GameModel to bind

  • Method Details

    • setItemBag

      public void setItemBag()
      This method sets the GameBoard's ItemBag at the beginning of every match. The procedure consists in creating a new ItemBag and filling it with the correct number of PlayableItemTiles

    • getItemBag

      public ItemBag getItemBag()
      Returns:
      the ItemBag associated with the GameBoard

    • setLivingRoom

      public void setLivingRoom(int playerNum)
      This method sets the GameBoard's LivingRoom at the beginning of every match. The procedure consists in creating a new instance of LivingRoom and then putting the NullItemTiles in the correct positions in the LivingRoomFactory depending on the value of playerNum.
      Parameters:
      playerNum - the number of Players in the match

    • firstFilling

      public void firstFilling(LivingRoom livingRoom)
      This method operates the first ever filling of the LivingRoom right after it has been created. The procedure searches for blank spaces inside the LivingRoom and fills them by picking a PlayableItemTile from the ItemBag.
      Parameters:
      livingRoom - the LivingRoom to fill

    • getLivingRoom

      public LivingRoom getLivingRoom()
      Returns:
      the LivingRoom of the match

    • setNextInGameTile

      public void setNextInGameTile()
      This method sets the next PlayableItemTile to put into the LivingRoom by picking it from the ItemBag

    • getNextInGameTile

      public PlayableItemTile getNextInGameTile()
      Returns:
      the next PlayableItemTile picked from the ItemBag that has to be put into the LivingRoom

    • getPickedTilesNum

      public int getPickedTilesNum()
      Returns:
      the number of PlayableItemTiles picked by a Player during the current turn

    • setToPlayerFirstTile

      public void setToPlayerFirstTile(int x, int y)
      This method adds the first picked PlayableItemTile to the ArrayList toPlayerTiles. The selected PlayableItemTile is picked from the LivingRoom and then put into the ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      x - the 'x' position on the LivingRoom of the PlayableItemTile to add
      y - the 'y' position on the LivingRoom of the PlayableItemTile to add

    • setToPlayerAnotherTile

      public void setToPlayerAnotherTile(int x, int y)
      This method adds the second or third picked PlayableItemTile to the ArrayList toPlayerTiles. The selected PlayableItemTile is picked from the LivingRoom and then put into the ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      x - the 'x' position on the LivingRoom of the PlayableItemTile to add
      y - the 'y' position on the LivingRoom of the PlayableItemTile to add

    • getToPlayerTiles

      public ArrayList<PlayableItemTile> getToPlayerTiles()
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing the PlayableItemTiles that the Player has picked during the turn
